item.title: Research
item.description: Photo by James Pond on Unsplash This week I started my research for my masters thesis. To say “I’m struggling” would be an understatement. The research part of any thesis is probably the most crucial part of the whole odyssey. It’s the part that sets the tone for the next 6 months. I guess struggling with the research will mean less struggle with the rest of the process. Hopefullyâ€¦right?
